DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, non-comparative, interventional, observational pilot study of the safety and pharmacokinetics of intravenous (IV) tigecycline in conjunction with standard oral therapy in patients with known mild to severe confirmed Clostridium difficile associated diarrhea (CDAD).
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Tigecycline in the Treatment of Clostridium Difficile Associated Diarrhea (CDAD)
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention is adding Tigecycline (standard doses) to standard oral therapy for CDAD. Patients will then be observed for clinical outcomes and relapse of CDAD.
